li.label: prude
li.description: NAME hates the sight of the human body. HECAP will be extremely unhappy when naked, more displeased than usual in tattered or worn-out clothing, and dislike the sight of other naked people.

li.label: insomniac
li.description: NAME will find it difficult to fall asleep because of HIS condition. HECAP will stay up longer and probably be tired a lot.

li.label: bleeding heart
li.description: NAME has a big heart and gets very emotional. HECAP loves helping people, and abhors violence and injustice. HE is more affected by these things than others.

li.label: gourmet
li.description: NAME is always a critic when it comes to food. HECAP expects to be fed well and will complain if HIS meals aren't up to par.

li.label: unstable
li.description: NAME is more prone to random mood swings, which can be more severe than normal for others.

li.label: lecher
li.description: NAME is unabashedly lecherous and a thoughtless heartbreaker. HECAP will hit on anyone HE desires with no regard for the consequences.

li.label: codependent
li.description: NAME is romantically needy and won't be happy unless in a relationship. HECAP will be devastated by infidelity and breakups.

li.label: outdoorsy
li.description: NAME loves to be outside. HECAP gets a mood bonus when there is no roof over HIS head.

li.label: pluviophile
li.description: NAME likes the rain. HECAP gets a mood bonus when it's pouring outside, especially if HE gets to go out in it.

li.label: photosensitive
li.description: NAME has eyes, either through gene modding or random mutation, that are extremely light-sensitive. HECAP finds bright light extremely painful and indoor lighting bothersome, and will be happiest in the dark.

li.label: socialite
li.description: NAME loves to party! HISCAP mere presence inspires more parties in the colony, because everyone enjoys partying with HIM.

li.label: desensitized
li.description: NAME has seen enough violence and death that it no longer shocks HIM like it used to.

li.label: heavy sleeper
li.description: NAME sleeps like a rock, never bothered by adverse sleeping conditions, but is difficult to wake up.

li.label: polyamorous
li.description: NAME doesn't see any problem with having multiple partners. HE doesn't mind if HIS partner romances other people, but will not be happy in a monogamous relationship.

li.label: open-minded
li.description: NAME sees people for what they are on the inside, not the outside. HE doesn't judge others for their appearances.
